Uses of Class
edu.fgcu.secrel.Service

    • Uses of Service in edu.fgcu.secrel

      Subclasses of Service in edu.fgcu.secrel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReliableHardwareService
      The ReliableHardwareService class represents a Service that is implemented through hardware.
      class  ReliableSoftwareService
      The ReliableHardwareService class represents a Service that is implemented through software, either as a Java class that can be run directly in invokeServiceInner or as an external executable.
      Fields in edu.fgcu.secrel with type parameters of type Service 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static NavigableMap<Integer,Service> SecRelSystem.serviceIds
      Maps service IDs to services.
      Methods in edu.fgcu.secrel that return Service 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Service SecRelSystem.findService(Integer serviceId)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Services.findService(Integer) instead
      static Service Services.findService(Integer serviceId)
      Finds the service with the specified service ID if one exists.
      static Service SecRelSystem.findService(String serviceName)
      Deprecated. 
      Use Services.findService(String) instead
      static Service Services.findService(String serviceName)
      Finds the service with the specified service name if one exists.
      Service Right.getService()
      Returns the Service.
      Methods in edu.fgcu.secrel that return types with arguments of type Service 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NavigableSet<Service> Authorizations.getAuthorizedServices(Integer roleId)
      Returns the services the role with the specified ID is authorized to invoke.

      Deprecated. 
      Use Authorizations.getAuthorizedServices(Integer) instead
      Set<Service> Role.getServices()
      Returns the services this Role is authorized to invoke.
